item.title: Kim Jong Il (1941 ? - 2011), North Korean "Dear Leader"
item.description: Reports: Bloomberg News, quoting Yonhap News.  The news came in a radio broadcast at noon local time, Yonhap reported, citing North Koreaâ€™s official media. Kim probably had a stroke in August 2008 and may have also contracted pancreatic cancer, according to South Korean news reports. Wall Street Journal: Mr. Kim died from fatigue during a train ride on Saturday, a weeping television announcer said. Yonhap News:
